languages.text: "Сам{mf||а} Лорд-капитан нашу еду отведал{mf||а} и {mf|счел|сочла} достойной! Запомните: будьте благодарны за любую пищу, ибо она есть благо!" {n}Громогласно рыча, Бригадир пытается невзначай встать между вами и толпой экзальтированных простолюдинов, способной в миг затоптать своего кумира в приступе любви.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Сам{mf||а} Лорд-капитан нашу еду отведал{mf||а} и {mf|счел|сочла} достойной! Запомните: будьте благодарны за любую пищу, ибо она есть благо!" {n}Громогласно рыча, Бригадир пытается невзначай встать между вами и толпой, чтобы меньше зевак могли наблюдать ваше позеленевшее лицо.{/n}

languages.text: "The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has tried our food and found it worthy! Remember to be grateful for any nourishment, as it is a blessing!" {n}The Foreman bellows and roars while discreetly interposing himself between you and the crowd of ecstatic commoners, who look like they might otherwise swarm and accidentally trample their overlord in a frenzy of adoration.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Сам{mf||а} Лорд-капитан нашу еду отведал{mf||а} и {mf|счел|сочла} достойной! Запомните: будьте благодарны за любую пищу, ибо она есть благо!" {n}Громогласно рыча, Бригадир пытается невзначай встать между вами и толпой экзальтированных простолюдинов, способной в миг затоптать своего кумира в приступе любви.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has tried our food and found it worthy! Remember to be grateful for any nourishment, as it is a blessing!" {n}The Foreman bellows and roars while discreetly interposing himself between you and the crowd of ecstatic commoners who look like they might swarm and accidentally trample their overlord in a fit of frenzied adoration.{/n}

"The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has tried our food and found it worthy! Remember to be grateful for any nourishment, for it is a blessing!" {n}The Foreman bellows and roars as he discreetly swaps the bowl under your nose for an empty one, and deftly uses the flap of his clothes as cover to let you get rid of the revolting meal with no witnesses.{/n}

"The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has tried our food and found it worthy! Remember to be grateful for any nourishment, as it is a blessing!" {n}The Foreman bellows and roars while discreetly interposing himself between you and the crowd of ecstatic commoners, who look like they might otherwise swarm and accidentally trample their overlord in a frenzy of adoration.{/n}

"The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has tried our food and found it worthy! Remember to be grateful for any nourishment, as it is a blessing!" {n}The Foreman bellows and roars as a diversion, while discreetly swapping the bowl under your nose for an empty one. Then he uses his loose clothing as cover to let you rid your body of the revolting meal with no witnesses.{/n}

"The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has tried our food and found it worthy! Remember to be grateful for any nourishment, as it is a blessing!" {n}The Foreman bellows and roars while discreetly interposing himself between you and the crowd of ecstatic commoners, who look like they might otherwise swarm and accidentally trample their overlord in a frenzy of adoration.{/n}

"The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has tried our food and found it worthy! Remember to be grateful for any nourishment, as it is a blessing!" {n}The Foreman bellows and roars while discreetly interposing himself between you and the crowd of ecstatic commoners who look like they might swarm and accidentally trample their overlord in a fit of frenzied adoration.{/n}

"The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has tried our food and found it worthy! Remember to be grateful for any nourishment, as it is a blessing!" {n}The Foreman bellows and roars while discreetly interposing himself between you and the crowd of ecstatic commoners, who look like they might otherwise swarm and accidentally trample their overlord in a frenzy of adoration.{/n}

"The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has tried our food and found it worthy! Remember to be grateful for any nourishment, as it is a blessing!" {n}The Foreman bellows and roars while discreetly interposing himself between you and the crowd of ecstatic commoners, who look like they might otherwise swarm and accidentally trample their overlord in a frenzy of adoration.{/n}

languages.text: «¡{mf|El|La} mismísim{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán ha probado nuestra comida y la ha disfrutado! ¡Recordad dar las gracias por todo alimento, pues es una bendición!». {n}El capataz grita y ruge al tiempo que se interpone discretamente entre tú y la multitud de plebeyos eufóricos que, de otra manera, podrían acabar espachurrando a su {mf|señor|señora} en un frenesí de afectividad desenfrenada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has tried our food and found it worthy! Remember to be grateful for any nourishment, as it is a blessing!" {n}The Foreman bellows and roars while discreetly interposing himself between you and the crowd of ecstatic commoners, who look like they might otherwise swarm and accidentally trample their overlord in a frenzy of adoration.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡{mf|El|La} mismísim{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán ha probado nuestra comida y la ha disfrutado! ¡Recordad dar las gracias por todo alimento, pues es una bendición!». {n}El capataz grita y ruge al tiempo que se interpone discretamente entre tú y la multitud de plebeyos eufóricos que, de otra manera, podrían acabar espachurrando a su {mf|señor|señora} en un frenesí de afectividad desenfrenada.{/n}

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン陛下が俺らの食い物を試食され、価値があるとお認めになった！どんな栄養であっても感謝することを忘れるんじゃないぞ。それは恵みなのだから！」{n}作業長は歓喜に酔いしれる庶民の群れとあなたの間にそっと割って入り、大声を張り上げる。庶民たちは喜びいさんで群がってきており、うっかり自分たちのオーヴァーロードを踏みつぶしてしまいそうな勢いだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has tried our food and found it worthy! Remember to be grateful for any nourishment, as it is a blessing!" {n}The Foreman bellows and roars while discreetly interposing himself between you and the crowd of ecstatic commoners, who look like they might otherwise swarm and accidentally trample their overlord in a frenzy of adoration.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン陛下が俺らの食い物を試食され、価値があるとお認めになった！どんな栄養であっても感謝することを忘れるんじゃないぞ。それは恵みなのだから！」{n}作業長は歓喜に酔いしれる庶民の群れとあなたの間にそっと割って入り、大声を張り上げる。庶民たちは喜びいさんで群がってきており、うっかり自分たちのオーヴァーロードを踏みつぶしてしまいそうな勢いだ。{/n}

languages.text: “舰长大人亲自品尝了我们的食物，觉得这很好吃！都给我记住了，不管是什么食物，都要心怀感激，因为这一切都是神皇的恩赐！”{n}工头高声咆哮着，小心翼翼地挡在你和欣喜若狂的平民之间。这群平民目光中充满了狂热的崇拜，看起来随时都可能会一拥而上，酿成意外踩踏事故，将你卷入其中。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has tried our food and found it worthy! Remember to be grateful for any nourishment, as it is a blessing!" {n}The Foreman bellows and roars while discreetly interposing himself between you and the crowd of ecstatic commoners, who look like they might otherwise swarm and accidentally trample their overlord in a frenzy of adoration.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人亲自品尝了我们的食物，觉得这很好吃！都给我记住了，不管是什么食物，都要心怀感激，因为这一切都是神皇的恩赐！”{n}工头高声咆哮着，小心翼翼地挡在你和欣喜若狂的平民之间。这群平民目光中充满了狂热的崇拜，看起来随时都可能会一拥而上，酿成意外踩踏事故，将你卷入其中。{/n}

languages.text: "Der Lord Captain selbst hat unser Essen gekostet und für würdig befunden! Denkt daran, für jede Speise dankbar zu sein, denn sie ist ein Segen!" {n}Der Vorarbeiter brüllt und schreit, während er sich diskret zwischen dich und die ekstatische Menge stellt, die aussieht, als würde sie {mf|ihren obersten Herrn|ihre oberste Herrin} andernfalls in einem Anflug von Begeisterung versehentlich niedertrampeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has tried our food and found it worthy! Remember to be grateful for any nourishment, as it is a blessing!" {n}The Foreman bellows and roars while discreetly interposing himself between you and the crowd of ecstatic commoners, who look like they might otherwise swarm and accidentally trample their overlord in a frenzy of adoration.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der Lord Captain selbst hat unser Essen gekostet und für würdig befunden! Denkt daran, für jede Speise dankbar zu sein, denn sie ist ein Segen!" {n}Der Vorarbeiter brüllt und schreit, während er sich diskret zwischen dich und die ekstatische Menge stellt, die aussieht, als würde sie {mf|ihren obersten Herrn|ihre oberste Herrin} andernfalls in einem Anflug von Begeisterung versehentlich niedertrampeln.{/n}

languages.text: « {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} en personne a goûté notre nourriture et l'a trouvée digne ! Soyez reconnaissants de tout ce qui vous est donné, car c'est une bénédiction ! » {n}Le contremaître beugle à pleins poumons tout en s'interposant discrètement entre vous et les gueux en liesse, de crainte que vous ne vous fassiez accidentellement {mf|piétiné|piétinée} lors d'un mouvement de foule.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has tried our food and found it worthy! Remember to be grateful for any nourishment, as it is a blessing!" {n}The Foreman bellows and roars while discreetly interposing himself between you and the crowd of ecstatic commoners, who look like they might otherwise swarm and accidentally trample their overlord in a frenzy of adoration.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} en personne a goûté notre nourriture et l'a trouvée digne ! Soyez reconnaissants de tout ce qui vous est donné, car c'est une bénédiction ! » {n}Le contremaître beugle à pleins poumons tout en s'interposant discrètement entre vous et les gueux en liesse, de crainte que vous ne vous fassiez accidentellement {mf|piétiné|piétinée} lors d'un mouvement de foule.{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, bizzat yiyeceğimizi denedi ve onu münasip buldu! Her türden yiyeceğin bir lütuf olduğunu unutmayın ve şükredin!" {n}Ustabaşı, mest olan yurttaşların oluşturduğu kalabalıkla aranda ihtiyatlı bir şekilde yer alarak feryatlar koparıp kükrüyor. Kalabalık, aksi takdirde hayranlığın getirdiği bir taşkınlık hâliyle efendilerinin etrafını sarıp istemeden onu ezebilecek gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has tried our food and found it worthy! Remember to be grateful for any nourishment, as it is a blessing!" {n}The Foreman bellows and roars while discreetly interposing himself between you and the crowd of ecstatic commoners, who look like they might otherwise swarm and accidentally trample their overlord in a frenzy of adoration.{/n}
